data.name: CommandManager_CommandAttributeMissing
data.value: In order to register command instance '{command}', it must have a [Command] attribute.

data.name: CommandManager_CommandFilterAttributeMissing
data.value: In order to register command filter instance '{filter}', it must have a [CommandFilter] attribute.

data.name: CommandManager_OwningPackageAttributeRequired
data.value: Command type '{type}' does not have the required attribute '{attribute}'.

data.name: CommandManager_OwningPackageNotFound
data.value: Command type '{type}' specifies owning package with id '{packageId}' but it could not be found or loaded.

data.name: CommandManager_OwningPackageNotServiceProvider
data.value: Command type '{type}' specifies owning package with id '{packageId}' which is not a valid service provider.

data.name: CommandManager_PackageGuidMissing
data.value: In order to register all commands for a given package automatically, the owning package '{package}' must have a [Guid] attribute applied, which must match the commands' corresponding [Command] attribute.

data.name: Diagnostics_FailedToCreateOutputWindow
data.value: Failed to create output window for diagnostics traces.

data.name: Hosting_UnsupportedRuntime
data.value: Unsupported Visual Studio version. Please update Clide.

data.name: Host_FailedToInitialize
data.value: Failed to initialize host.

data.name: General_MissingGuidAttribute
data.value: Hosting package '{packageType}' does not have the required [Guid] attribute.

data.name: OptionsManager_FailedToRegisterPage
data.value: Failed to register page '{pageType}'.

data.name: OptionsManager_ManagedPackageRequired
data.value: The owning package of a page must be a managed package, inheriting from '{managedPackageBaseType}'.

data.name: OptionsManager_OwningPackageNotFound
data.value: Options page specified package owner with Guid '{owningPackageGuid}', but the package could not be found or loaded.

data.name: OptionsManager_OwningPackageRequired
data.value: Options page of type '{pageType}' does not provide the required '{owningPackageAttributeType}' attribute.

data.name: OptionsManager_PageCategoryRequired
data.value: Options page '{pageType}' must have a Category attribute that specifies the name of the root category node this page shows under in the Tools | Options dialog.

data.name: OptionsManager_PageDisplayNameRequired
data.value: Options page '{pageType}' must have a DisplayName attribute that determines the name of the node under the specified category in the Tools | Options dialog tree.

data.name: OptionsManager_Unsupported
data.value: Tools options pages are not supported in this version of Visual Studio.

data.name: DevEnv_OutputPaneTitle
data.value: Clide

data.name: SettingsManager_CannotSaveAsString
data.value: Cannot persist setting value of type '{valueType}' from property '{owningType}.{propertyName}'. An appropriate type converter that can convert the value to a string is required.

data.name: SettingsManager_FailedToRead
data.value: Failed to read settings class '{settingsType}' from the settings store.

data.name: SettingsManager_InvalidValue
data.value: Cannot assign value of type '{valueType}' to property '{owningType}.{propertyName}' of type '{propertyType}'. An appropriate type converter is required.

data.name: Settings_AlreadyInitialized
data.value: Object has already been initialized.

data.name: Settings_EndEditWithoutBeginEdit
data.value: EndEdit invoked without corresponding BeginEdit.

data.name: Settings_EndInitWithoutBeginInit
data.value: EndInit invoked without corresponding BeginInit.

data.name: Settings_FailedToRestore
data.value: Failed to restore original state when editing was cancelled.

data.name: Settings_TraceSaved
data.value: Settings successfully saved.

data.name: SolutionNode_InvalidSolutionFile
data.value: The solution file is invalid.

data.name: VsCommandExtensionAdapter_CannotExecute
data.value: Attempted to execute command '{commandText}' ({commandType}) but current command status does not allow it.

data.name: VsCommandExtensionAdapter_ExecuteShieldMessage
data.value: Command did not execute successfully due to an unexpected exception. Please check the output window for additional information.

data.name: VsCommandExtensionAdapter_ExecutingCommand
data.value: Executing command '{commandText}' ({commandType}).

data.name: VsCommandExtensionAdapter_QueryStatusShieldMessage
data.value: Command could not determine its current status due to an unexpected exception. Please check the output window for additional information.

data.name: ConfigProjectProperties_UnsupportedProject
data.value: Project '{projectFile}' must be based on MSBuild in order to support dynamic properties.

data.name: SolutionTreeNode_SelectionUnsupported
data.value: Selecting element '{itemPath}' is not supported by the underlying project type.

data.name: IProjectNodeExtensions_BuildNoSolution
data.value: The specified project '{project}' does not have a valid owning solution.

data.name: IProjectNodeExtensions_FailedToLoadAssembly
data.value: Failed to load assemly reference '{reference}' from path '{path}'.

data.name: IProjectNodeExtensions_InvalidTypeContext
data.value: Could not retrieve the required type discovery services from the project.

data.name: IProjectNodeExtensions_InvalidVsContext
data.value: Cannot retrieve project types. Project is not a valid Visual Studio project, or the service provider cannot be retrieved from it.

data.name: IProjectNodeExtensions_NoBuildOutput
data.value: Building project '{projectName}' did not generate the expected output assembly '{assemblyFile}'.

data.name: IProjectNodeExtensions_NoTargetAssemblyName
data.value: Could not determine the target assembly name for project '{projectName}'. The project TargetFileName and/or TargetDir properties are empty.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_CompositionErrors
data.value: Composition errors prevented the successfull creation of the development environment API. All {primaryRejectionCount} primary rejection errors will be logged.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_CreatingComposition
data.value: Initializing development environment composition.

data.name: IServiceProviderExtensions_MissingGuidAttribute
data.value: Specified package type '{packageType}' does not have the required [Guid] attribute.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_ClideCantBeMefComponent
data.value: {clideAssembly} cannot be exported as a MEF component in the hosting extension manifest.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_ClideComponentAlsoMefComponent
data.value: The following assemblies are specified as both Clide components and MEF components in the package manifest '{packageManifest}': {assemblies}. This is typically an error and could result in duplicate exports to the global composition container in Visual Studio. If you want to export some components only as MEF components or Clide components, place them in separate assemblies and configure them separately in the manifest.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_ClideComponentNotFound
data.value: The extension manifest file '{packageManifest}' specified a Clide component '{clideComponent}' that was not found at '{assemblyFile}'.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_ClideNotNecessaryAsComponent
data.value: The Clide main assembly does not need to be added as Clide component in the extension manifest file '{packageManifest}'.

data.name: OptionsManager_ShellReferenceNotFound
data.value: Could not find reference to Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell (either 10.0 or 11.0) on the given package type {packageType}.

data.name: CommandManager_CommandInterceptorAttributeMissing
data.value: In order to register command interceptor instance '{interceptor}', it must have a [CommandInterceptor] attribute.

data.name: CommandManager_CommandNotFound
data.value: Package '{packageId}' does not provide a command with group identifier '{groupId}' and command identifier '{commandId}'.

data.name: CommandManager_CommandNotOle
data.value: Command to filter does not provide the required BeforeQueryStatus event (typically inherited from OleMenuCommand). Filtering cannot be performed. (Package Id: '{packageId}', Group Id: '{groupId}', Command Id '{commandId}')

data.name: CommandManager_CommandPackageNotServiceProvider
data.value: Loaded package with identifier '{packageId}' that owns the command to filter is not a service provider.

data.name: CommandManager_CommandRegistered
data.value: Registered command {commandText} ({commandType}).

data.name: CommandManager_FilterFailed
data.value: Command filter {filter} caused an unexpected exception: {exception}.

data.name: CommandManager_InterceptorFailed
data.value: Command interceptor {interceptor} caused an unexpected exception: {exception}.

data.name: CommandManager_NoMenuCommandService
data.value: Could not retrieve the menu command service from the package with identifier '{packageId}' that owns the command to filter.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_ClideComponentDeclared
data.value: Found Clide component '{component}' to register for composition at '{componentAssembly}'.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_DetectedInstallPath
data.value: Detected hosting package installation path at '{installPath}'.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_ExtensionManifestFound
data.value: Extension manifest for hosting package found at '{manifestFile}'.

data.name: DevEnvFactory_ExtensionManifestNotFound
data.value: Extension manifest for hosting package not found at expected location '{manifestFile}'.

data.name: ComponentModelExtensions_ExportProviderIsNotCompositionService
data.value: The given export provider '{provider}' does not implement the required ICompositionService interface.

data.name: CommandManager_DuplicateCommand
data.value: Command with id '{id}' and group '{group}' has already been registered with the menu command service.

data.name: IProjectNodeExtensions_BuildException
data.value: Failed to invoke build.

data.name: ISolutionNodeExtensions_BuildException
data.value: Failed to invoke build.

data.name: ISolutionNodeExtensions_BuildNotSupported
data.value: The specified solution does not support builds.

data.name: CompositionSource_ImportManyRequired
data.value: In order to retrieve the multiple components of type {componentType} from Visual Studio composition, the [ImportMany] annotation has to be used.
